clinical_study.brief_title: Cerebral, Meningeal Biopsy by Flexible Endoscopy in Patients Without Neurological Diagnosis
clinical_study.official_title: Cerebral, Meningeal Biopsy by Flexible Endoscopy in Patients Without Neurological Diagnosis

lead_sponsor.agency: Universidad Autonoma de San Luis Potosí

clinical_study.source: Universidad Autonoma de San Luis Potosí

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators will take cerebral and subarachnoid biopsy by flexible endoscopy in patients without neurological findings. The investigators will use retrospective and prospective patients.

detailed_description.textblock:
Test the useful of the flexible endoscopy in patients without neurological diagnosis.
Developed a diagnosis method for idiopathic neurological findings.
Compare the cerebral and subarachnoid biopsy each other

primary_outcome.measure: Test the useful of the cerebral and subarachnoid biopsy by flexible endoscopy in patients without neurological findings

secondary_outcome.measure: Developed a diagnosis method for idiopathic neurological findings. Compare the cerebral and subarachnoid biopsy each other

arm_group.description: patients without neurological diagnosis that require cerebral , meningeal diagnosis

intervention.description: The investigators will make a burrhole in the precoronal suture introducing the flexible endoscope taking a cerebral and a basal meningeal biopsy

study_pop.textblock: Patients between 0 and 85years old with neurological diseases that there are not a diagnosis

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients with neurological disease and with out diagnosis
Exclusion Criteria:
- death of the patient
- patients with neurological diagnosis
